WorkItem.Description:
Rawr 2.3.14 and 2.3.15 take a very long time to start on my (quite powerful) system. Way longer than any previous version took.
My PC has a Intel Core i7 920 @ 3.3 Ghz (HT off), 6 GB RAM and I'm running Windows 7 Home Premium x64.
Â 
Rawr 2.3.15 takes about 25 seconds to start. During this time, it uses 25% CPU (so one complete core). But I think the problem is memory allocations. If you watch the task manager during start, the memory of Rawr.exe grows up to more than 600 MB for about 20 seconds, then suddenly falls back to 60 MB and then grows again to about 200 MB in the remaining 5 seconds.

Comments.Message: What model are you starting up into?
Usually Retribution, but it doesn't matter, it's exactly the same with all modules I tested (Healadin, ProtPaladin, Mage, DPSDK).
Same here - 64 bit Win 7/6Gb RAM/AMD Athlon II X4 640 - only using for my moonkin
